about_the_game:
Another story of 'GLASS' in cute SD.
Let's solve the puzzle and enjoy Renki, Iris, and Michelle's cute daily life.
Welcome to the world of Petit GLASS!

'Petit GLASS' is a game about the cute daily lives of Heroines in the glass world.
This is a side story of GLASS, designed to repay the support of customers who buy our game.
I would be happy if you think of it as a donation that helps poor development teams.
(for next game or DLC)
Unfortunately, this time we don't support voice actors, but with the help of the production crew,
It contains a lot of cute conversations and situations.
Please have fun,

'Petit Glass' can be searched on Google, and you can send URL addresses to your friends.
It's still indirect. Feel free to send your address to your friends and recommend 'GLASS WORLD' to them.
